about_the_game:
"Monster Knockout Game Over": This track sets the tone for the game with its driving drums, wailing guitars. It's the perfect accompaniment to the adrenaline-fueled battles between the game's monstrous characters.

"Monster Knockout Soundtrack": This atmospheric piece combines tribal drums, eerie synths, and haunting beats to create a sense of foreboding as players explore the game's dark and mysterious environments.

"Original Monster Knockout Soundtrack": This triumphant orchestral piece celebrates the player's victories in the games main menu with soaring strings, heroic brass, and thundering percussion.

"Pong Mobile Credits": This haunting piano and string composition underscores the player's moments of defeat in the game, creating a sense of sadness and loss.

"Pong Mobile Main Theme": This epic track builds to a climactic battle between the player and the game's final boss, featuring driving rhythms, soaring melodies, and intense choir vocals.

Overall, the "Monster Knockout" soundtrack is a diverse and powerful collection of music that enhances the game's atmosphere and gameplay. The optional high-quality versions offer even more depth and immersion for players who want to fully immerse themselves in the world of the game.

name: Monster Knockout Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are just the minimum sizes required to download the soundtrack
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
